subject: ATTENTION: xxx,
body:
ATTENTION: xxx,
Ref.: Transfer Payment Approval Notice.
Approved Payment Valued: US$5,800,000.00.
Payment Reference No.: Zenith Bank/WB/NF/UN/XX027.
We write to inform you officially that we have received and confirmed a transfer authorization instruction from the United Nations Funds Investigation Unit in your favor valued at US$5,800,000.00 (Five Million Eight Hundred Thousand US Dollars Only). Please note that this approved long awaited Contract/Inheritance payment Instruction has been verified by our Legal Department through the rightful Authorities for a smooth Credit to your Bank account via Swift Telegraphic Wire Transfer or ATM card respectively. However, it is our pleasure to inform you that your ATM Card Number; 4988 2414 7616 3496 has been approved and upgraded in your favor. Meanwhile, your Secret Pin Number will be available as soon as you confirm to us the receipt of your ATM CARD.
As the Chief Financial Officer, Zenith Bank (Nigeria) I write to inform you that the above amount is ready to be released to you.
Kindly reconfirm your full name, address and telephone number
 to this email. (
craigmorgan01109@gmail.com
)
Thank you for your anticipated co-operation.
Awaiting your response.
Mr. Ebenezer Onyeagwu,
Chief Financial Officer,
Zenith Bank Of Nigeria.

subject: Re: ATTENTION: xxx,
body:
Hello Mr. Ebenezer Onyeagwu,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the transfer payment approval notice. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. However, before I proceed, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure everything is in order.

1. Could you please provide more details about the United Nations Funds Unit and how they are involved in this transfer?

2. What is the purpose of this transfer? Is it related to a specific contract or project?

3. Can you explain the process of receiving the funds via Swift Wire Transfer or ATM card? Which option would you recommend?

4. How long will it take for the funds to be credited to my bank account or for me to receive the ATM card?

5. Are there any fees or charges associated with this transaction? If so, what are they and how can I make the payment?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with this transfer.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: ATTENTION: xxx,
body:
[image: Zenith Bank] [image: Zenith Bank]
       *WELCOME TO ZENITH BANK PLC*
*THE MANAGER,*
*INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT,*
*MANAGING DIRECTOR OF ZENITH BANK PLC,*
*PLOT 1662, OYIN JOLAYEMI STREET, *
*VICTORIA - ISLAND, LAGOS STATE,*
*NIGERIA.*
[image: Picture] *info@zenitthbank.*


Attention: Patricia,

Dear Beneficiary, Yes this is legit you have all information you can
contact me anytime you must comply with what you are saying because of the
laws Govern banking system here in Nigeria and i want you to know that Your
Fund is now approved and since we have now verified your information being
the rightful owner of this fund, please you have to choose from 1 to 3
options and get back to the Zenith Bank of Nigeria and send us your best
choice with the payment required, so that we can release your fund to you
as the rightful owner of this fund of US$5,800,000.00 (Five Million Eight
Hundred Thousand US Dollars Only). I am waiting for your positive urgent
response and don't forget to call me on my Phone Number: +234-9048919493 so
you can also send your phone Number so we can call you on the phone as well.

Option (1)
Bank To Bank Transfer: This is a direct electronic transfer that will
enable you to receive the sum of money in your bank account that you
provided for this Bank to effect the transfer as it is always done
electronically. It will take three (3) working days to reflect in the
account.
    Cost of transfer:............... $1,054
    Insurance:.................... ... $120
    Total:........................ ... $1,174

Option (2)
ATM Card Payment: You will have to receive an ATM Card and approved
clearance documents that will take two (2) working days to deliver to your
doorstep. We will have to use our courier company to deliver the parcel to
your doorstep in Your Country  and he will cash it for you before he will
leave back To Nigeria.
    Agent fee:...................... $165
    Insurance:.................... .. $120
    Total:........................ $385

Option (3)
Bank Cashier Check: you have to receive A check at your doorstep with a
clearance Documents, this will take One day to deliver to your home. We
will use a diplomatic Agent to bring it to your doorstep in your country
and he will cash it for you before he will leave back To Nigeria.
    Agent fee:............... $325
    Insurance:................ $120
    Total:..................... $445

Any option you make now, we will start processing transfer, then you need
to comply with the payment for the transfer to take place before thursday
15 of February 2024 and note that you don't have to send any more money
after this only payment because your payment is now approved Please note In
our bank CUSTOMER service, our duty is to save and protect our customers to
avoid any future fee or more cost and that is why we have to wait till a
payment of our customer is approved before we can advise you with the only
requested fee to get your funds which you have the option on this email to
pick up your choice and work with the directive for the conclusion of your
transaction.

Thank You for Your Understanding As I Look Forward To hear  From You
Best Regards,
God Bless you Mrs. Patricia,

*MR. EBENEZER ONYEAGWU EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF ZENITH BANK.*

subject: Re: ATTENTION: xxx,
body:
Dear Mrs. Patricia and Mr. Ebenezer Onyeagwu,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the approval of my fund. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more details about the laws governing the banking system in Nigeria that I need to comply with?

2. What are the specific payment requirements for each option? It would be helpful to know the exact amount and how it should be paid.

3. Could you explain further how each option works? For example, if I choose Option 1, how will the transfer process take place?

4. Is there any additional documentation or paperwork that I need to provide in order to proceed with the transfer?

I look forward to your response and guidance on these matters.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: ATTENTION: xxx,
body:
Dear Mrs. Patricia and Mr. Ebenezer Onyeagwu,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the approval of my fund. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more details about the laws governing the banking system in Nigeria that I need to comply with?

2. What are the specific payment requirements for each option? I would like to understand the costs involved before making a decision.

3. Could you explain how the transfer process works if I choose Option 1? How long does it usually take for the funds to reflect in my bank account?

4. For Options 2 and 3, what are the clearance documents that need to be delivered? Are there any additional fees associated with these options?

5. Is it possible to receive more information about the diplomatic agent or courier company who will be handling the delivery of the clearance documents or funds?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with this transaction.

Best wishes,
Patricia

subject: Re: ATTENTION: xxx,
body:
Good morning Mr. Ebenezer Onyeagwu,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with the necessary information. I hope you are doing well too.

I understand that there is a transfer fee that needs to be paid in order to proceed with the transfer of my funds. Can you please provide me with more details about this fee? What is it specifically for, and how can I make the payment?

Also, could you clarify what COT stands for? I'm not familiar with that term.

Lastly, once the payment is made, how long will it take for the funds to reflect in my bank account?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Patricia
